body.p: Version 6.0 comes in two installation images:

p.ph: Use this install image to install Version 6 on a system with no previous version of installed on it (fresh install).

Use this install image to upgrade Version TP5521 or later to Version 6. If you are using a version of prior to TP5521, you must first upgrade to Version TP5521 and then to Version 6 using TM6xUPD.EXE. You can also uninstall your older version of and install version 6 using TM6xBase.EXE.
p.fn: NOTE: Back up any translation material as described in "Reusing /2 Version 1.0 translation material"

ol.li: Download the version 6 install image TM6xUPD.EXE from the ftp server.
Start the installation by running the install image TM6xUPD.EXE.
On the welcome screen click on "Next". The setup status window is displayed.
On the next screen click on "Finish".
